Subject: Opening Ceremonies
Description: Join our con chair, Nuri Gocay, the Con Committee, and our Guests of Honor as we open this bad boy up for the weekend. You never know what surprises might be in store!  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender, Aral Balkan, Annalee Newitz, Albert Manero, ,Charlie Jane Anders, Ivan Owen, Jen Owen - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Microphone, Sound System

Subject: Geeks with Needles: Embroidery 101
Description: Come learn the basics of hand embroidery! Join us to learn some stitches and techniques that you'll have plenty of time to practice. Materials will be provided, but spots are limited - please sign up at Ops!  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Leigh Mileur - Track: DIY  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Cooking With the Con Chair: Sushi!
Description: Our illustrious Con Char and indefatigable Head of Programming take an hour out from their real passions (Con - duh!) to share one of their other passions - sushi!  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Nuri Gocay - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Penguicon 2016 Planning Meeting
Description: Making a successful Penguicon requires at least a year of organizing, planning, and partying. Do not skip the partying! Join us for the first planning meeting with the 2016 ConChair, Scott Kennedy, and his selected Con Committee. If you you want to contribute to Penguicon next year, or you just want to see how we make it happen, join us!  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Closing Ceremonies
Description: As we officially shut down another amazing, exciting year for Penguicon, come hear about how it went, and what we've got our eye on for next year.  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender, Aral Balkan, Annalee Newitz, Albert Manero, Charlie Jane Anders, Ivan Owen, Jen Owen - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Microphone, Sound System
